professional.title: Applications Programmer at MK Themed Attractions Philippines Inc.
professional.content: Applications Programmer specializing in software and applications development. Well-versed in numerous programming languages including Python 3, PHP, JavaScript, Vb.Net, SQL, Vue, Laravel and micro controllers. Strong background in project management, version control, and customer relations.

professional.title: Development of project SICAT at Tarlac Agricutural University
professional.content: Develop a forecasting webapp that may help to predict rice yield in the province of tarlac based from a given satellite data. It involves machine learning and image processing to forecast and identify crops based on a given satellite image.
